caption.body: Roberto Olivera, a second-generation immigrant who worked California’s tomato fields to escape poverty and an affectionless stepfather, explains the lessons his mother taught him in this touching and reflective film made by Mr. Olivera’s son-in-law.  See "Canción del Campo (Field Song)" by Brad Bischoff, now playing in the Video Arts gallery, located pre-security in the International Terminal. http://bit.ly/2AxPBHe . . .
caption.excerpt: Roberto Olivera, a second-generation immigrant who worked California’s tomato fields to escape poverty and an affectionless stepfather, explains the lessons his mother taught him in this touching and reflective film made by Mr. Olivera’s son-in-law.
